response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents years of innovation but also embodies the essence of quality and functionality. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering its exceptional capabilities and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. I trust that you will appreciate the investment in this product as it promises to deliver significant returns on your expectations. If you're interested in exploring further or have any questions about how this product can enhance your needs, please let me know. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 15000}
